description: A comprehensive resume management system for recruiters and administrators to manage candidate resumes with role-based access control, file management, and sharing capabilities.

authentication.description: Secure user authentication with role-based access control
acceptance_criteria: Users can login with valid credentials
Invalid login attempts are rejected with appropriate errors
Sessions persist across browser refreshes
Users are redirected based on their role
Logout clears all session data
Only PDF files can be uploaded
File names follow CANDIDATE_NAME_timestamp_random.ext format
Resume status can be updated (new, reviewing, assigned, shortlisted, rejected)
Resumes can be assigned to specific recruiters
Search works across candidate names, emails, and skills
Filtering works by status and assignee
Users can only access resumes they have permission to view
Files open in new browser tab or download automatically
File access works on both desktop and mobile devices
Unauthorized access attempts are blocked
Only admins can access user management features
New users can be created with username, full name, and role
User list shows all system users
Recruiters cannot access admin features

shareLinks.description: Secure resume sharing via time-limited links
acceptance_criteria: Share links provide access without authentication
Links have configurable expiration times
Expired links are automatically rejected
WhatsApp sharing includes candidate information
Share links can be revoked by authorized users
Theme preference is persisted across sessions
Application is fully functional on mobile devices
Navigation adapts to screen size
All user actions provide appropriate feedback
Error messages are clear and helpful

security.inputValidation: All inputs validated on client and server
security.rateLimiting: API rate limiting to prevent abuse

usability.language: English (with i18n structure for future expansion)

reliability.errorRecovery: Graceful error handling with user-friendly messages

userStories.title: Admin User Login
userStories.description: As an admin, I want to login to the system so that I can manage users and resumes
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can login with valid credentials
Admin is redirected to dashboard after login
Admin has access to all system features
Invalid login attempts show appropriate error messages

userStories.title: Resume Upload
userStories.description: As a recruiter, I want to upload candidate resumes so that they can be reviewed and managed
acceptanceCriteria: Recruiter can upload PDF files
Candidate information is captured during upload
Files are named with candidate name format
Upload progress is shown to user
Success/error messages are displayed

userStories.title: Resume Assignment
userStories.description: As an admin, I want to assign resumes to specific recruiters so that workload can be distributed
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can select recruiter from dropdown
Assignment is saved and reflected in system
Assigned recruiter can access the resume
Assignment history is tracked

userStories.title: Resume Viewing
userStories.description: As a user, I want to view resume files so that I can review candidate information
acceptanceCriteria: Resume opens in new browser tab or downloads
File access respects user permissions
Works on both desktop and mobile devices
Loading indicators are shown during file access

userStories.title: Share Resume Link
userStories.description: As a user, I want to generate shareable links for resumes so that I can share them with others
acceptanceCriteria: Share link is generated with expiration time
WhatsApp sharing includes candidate details
Links can be accessed without authentication
Expired links are rejected with appropriate message

userStories.title: Dark Mode Toggle
userStories.description: As a user, I want to toggle between light and dark themes so that I can use the app comfortably
acceptanceCriteria: Theme toggle button is easily accessible
Theme changes are applied immediately
Theme preference is saved across sessions
All components adapt to selected theme

testingStrategy.unitTests: Jest for component and utility testing
testingStrategy.e2eTests: TestSprite for complete user flow testing
testingStrategy.performanceTests: Load testing for file upload and API endpoints
testingStrategy.securityTests: Authentication, authorization, and input validation testing

deliverables.name: Resume Management
deliverables.description: Upload, view, assign, and manage resumes

deliverables.name: User Management
deliverables.description: Admin functionality for user creation and management

deliverables.name: Share Link Feature
deliverables.description: Generate and manage shareable resume links

riskAssessment.risk: File upload failures on mobile devices
riskAssessment.mitigation: Comprehensive mobile testing and fallback mechanisms

riskAssessment.risk: Performance issues with large file uploads
riskAssessment.mitigation: File size limits and progress indicators
Strict permission checks and security audits
